string-array.name: question0
string-array.item: 1. One reason why a diamond axe may be a better weapon than a diamond sword is because a diamond axe
a) Deals more damage per hit
b) Has a higher attack speed
d) Requires fewer resources to craft
e) Can receive mending through an enchanting table, whereas the sword cannot

string-array.name: question1
string-array.item: 2. A hoe is enchanted with 5 levels of experience. What is the chance that the hoe will receive only unbreaking?

string-array.name: question2
string-array.item: 3. One bone can be used to craft how many bone meal?

string-array.name: question3
string-array.item: 4. Two stone pickaxes, one with 40 durability and the other with 60 durability, are combined in a crafting table. How much durability will the resulting stone pickaxe have?

string-array.name: question4
string-array.item: 5. Marcus Persson is the creator of Minecraft. What nickname is he commonly given?

string-array.name: question5
string-array.item: 6. The following command is executed: /tp steve ~5 ~ ~ In what direction will steve move?

string-array.name: question6
string-array.item: 7. When creating portals, one block in the nether corresponds to how many blocks in the overworld?

string-array.name: question7
string-array.item: Questions 8-9 refer to the following information. Data for a Food in Minecraft Saturation Restored 12.8 Saturation Ratio 1.6 Saturation Ratio = Saturation Restored Hunger Points Provided 8. How many hunger points does this food provide?

string-array.name: question8
string-array.item: Questions 8-9 refer to the following information. Data for a Food in Minecraft Saturation Restored 12.8 Saturation Ratio 1.6 Saturation Ratio = Saturation Restored Hunger Points Provided 9. What food has the properties depicted in the table?

string-array.name: question9
string-array.item: 10. What resource do zombie pigmen drop?

string-array.name: question10
string-array.item: 11. How many redstone is needed to craft a clock?

string-array.name: question11
string-array.item: 12. How is a bottle o’ enchanting obtained?

string-array.name: question12
string-array.item: 13. On what kind of tree do cocoa beans generate?

string-array.name: question13
string-array.item: 14. Adding redstone to a potion causes what?
a) It increases the duration of the potion
b) It increases the strength of the potion
c) It creates an awkward potion
d) It negates the effect (for example, a potion of healing turns to a potion of damage)
e) Redstone cannot be added to a brewing stand

string-array.name: question14
string-array.item: 15. Which block will not move when there is air below it?

string-array.name: question15
string-array.item: 16. Which effect will increase mining speed?

string-array.name: question16
string-array.item: 17. What (if anything) is wrong with the following client command? /tp 4000000 0 0
a) X=4,000,000 is outside the world
b) Y=0 is in the void
c) The player to be teleported is not specified
d) Unloaded chunks cannot be teleported to
e) Nothing; the command will execute without error

string-array.name: question17
string-array.item: 18. What kind of villager wears a white robe?

string-array.name: question18
string-array.item: 19. How many sticks can be crafted from one wood (not wooden plank)?

string-array.name: question19
string-array.item: 20. In what game do players try to mine the blocks under their opponents?

string-array.name: question20
string-array.item: 21. Which is not a type of minecart that can be crafted?

string-array.name: question21
string-array.item: Questions 22-23 refer to the following list I. Blaze Powder II. Charcoal/Coal III. Gunpowder 22. Which of these items are needed to craft a fire charge?

string-array.name: question22
string-array.item: Questions 22-23 refer to the following list I. Blaze Powder II. Charcoal/Coal III. Gunpowder 23. Which of these items can be used as fuel?

string-array.name: question23
string-array.item: 24. In the nether, nether quartz ore is about as abundant as which ore in the overworld?

string-array.name: question24
string-array.item: 25. Suppose a torch (light level 14) is placed in a large flat cavern at (x,y,z)=(1,100,1). What is the light level at (4,100,-3), assuming no other light sources?

string-array.name: question25
string-array.item: 26. The default flat surface area enclosed by the world border is about how many blocks?

string-array.name: question26
string-array.item: Questions 27-28 refer to the following “It’s more magical than that! It automatically opens and turns towards players who get close”. 27. Who said the quote?

string-array.name: question27
string-array.item: Questions 27-28 refer to the following “It’s more magical than that! It automatically opens and turns towards players who get close”. 28. What block is being described?

string-array.name: question28
string-array.item: 29. Assume roll=2 and the p-value of an unstackable item is .185. What is the chance that exactly one item appears?

string-array.name: question29
string-array.item: 30. What is the average y-coordinate for the surface of an ocean biome?

string-array.name: question30
string-array.item: 32. What blast resistance do all ore blocks have?

string-array.name: question31
string-array.item: Question 33-34 refer to the following commands in a default redstone-ready preset world //fill 6 1 7 4 9 2 minecraft:dirt //fill 7 8 3 6 5 1 minecraft:stone 33. After execution, how many dirt blocks will be in the world?

string-array.name: question32
string-array.item: Question 33-34 refer to the following commands in a default redstone-ready preset world //fill 6 1 7 4 9 2 minecraft:dirt //fill 7 8 3 6 5 1 minecraft:stone 34. After execution, how many stone blocks will be in the world?

string-array.name: question33
string-array.item: 35. Which dye cannot be obtained without crafting?

string-array.name: question34
string-array.item: 36. Which type of pressure plate will increase the strength of the redstone signal emitted for each additional item dropped onto it (until the signal strength is 15)?

string-array.name: question36
string-array.item: 38. Which mob can only be attacked by melee damage and splash potions?

string-array.name: question38
string-array.item: Question 40 refers to the following list I. doFireTick II. keepInventory III. mobGriefing 40. Which of these gamerules is (are) set to true by default?

string-array.name: question39
string-array.item: 41. Which of the following commands has the same effect as /time set noon?

string-array.item: 42. Which of these commands requires the lowest op level (0) in multiplayer?

string-array.item: 43. Which plant block will break (and drop its item) if a block is placed adjacent to it?

string-array.name: question42
string-array.item: 44. Which is the only command that can only be executed in single player?

string-array.name: question43
string-array.item: 45. Which block forms when water flows into lava?
